plot: LoA is a deity, however, unlike devils, saints or angels, she is not simply prayed to, they are served, especially by the unwilling... As it manifests itself, victims are claimed and lives consumed.
title: LoA
plot_es: LoA is a deity, however, unlike devils, saints or angels, she is not simply prayed to, they are served, especially by the unwilling... As it manifests itself, victims are claimed and lives consumed.
plot_en: LoA is a deity, however, unlike devils, saints or angels, she is not simply prayed to, they are served, especially by the unwilling... As it manifests itself, victims are claimed and lives consumed.
